justification: The proposal centers on Team A’s upgrade and ignores Team B’s conservative mindset, urgent need for wins, and avoidance of injury risk. Offering an injured TE (David Flores, Q) and a low-tier committee RB (Austin Wright) for B’s healthy ascending Tier 2 WR (Austin Torres) conflicts with B’s preferences and consensus values. While positionally possible, it’s contextually misaligned and unlikely to be accepted. The rationale is generic and A-centric, with no explanation of why B would see the return as safer or immediately helpful.
